text: Egha dughiar kamɨn me bar Sekemɨn nguibamɨn ikia, Josua gumazamizibar danganim inigha, Ikiavɨra Itir God ko Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir mam gami. Ezɨ Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir kam, arazir God ifongeziba ko bizir God damuasa me mɨkemeziba, an aven iti. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir kamɨn gɨn mangam.
